data.message: Your new Coke Zero is a failure. It tastes like Diet Coke. You'll loose many customers- the reason I liked Coke Zero is that it tasted like the normal Coca Cola.

replies.message: Hi Aga, thanks for getting in touch. We‘re genuinely sorry to hear that you dislike the new taste. Coca-Cola Zero already tasted great but we’ve been working to see if we can bring the taste even closer to the taste of Coca-Cola Classic. We think this will encourage even more people to try a no sugar version of Coca-Cola and will help people who are looking to reduce their sugar intake. The reaction from consumers in taste tests has been really positive and results show a significant improvement in the number of people who agree that the new drink tastes even more like Coke. However, we really appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us and we will certainly share your feedback with our brand team. Thanks
